sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {LessonPackage} from "../lessonPackage.interface"; @Component({ selector: 'app-lesson-edit-form', templateUrl: './lesson-edit-form.component.html' }) export class LessonEditFormComponent { lessonPackage: LessonPackage = { title: '', description: '', category: '', level: '', prerequisite: [], tags: [], copyright: ''}; }
